docs.description: Seminal paper on BERT, a popular LLM architecture.

blogs.description: Detailed blog post with visualizations explaining how GPT-3 works.

blogs.title: The Unreasonable Effectiveness of Recurrent Neural Networks
blogs.description: Classic blog post on RNNs, which are predecessors to Transformers.

blogs.title: Understanding Large Language Models
blogs.description: OpenAI's research blog on the evolution and workings of large language models.

youtube.description: A comprehensive explanation of LLMs by Yannic Kilcher.

youtube.description: Lecture by Stanford on the rise and mechanics of LLMs.

free_courses.description: Stanford's NLP course covering Transformers and LLMs.
